actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claims of George Radin against the Government of Italy, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claims of George Radin against the Government of Italy.

titles.title: A bill to require the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claims of George Radin against the Government of Italy, and for other purposes.
